item.title: ‘Cupid’ by FIFTY FIFTY rises 22 spots to a new peak of #19 on this week's Billboard Hot 100.
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
First reactions of #TheLittleMermaid are praising Halle Bailey’s performance:
“She’s why this new take is worth watching.”
item.author: PopBase

item.title: #TheLittleMermaid is being hailed by critics as Disney’s best live-action adaptation to date following its world premiere.
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
Halle Bailey on the cultural impact of playing Ariel in #TheLittleMermaid:
“It means the world to me, this moment, especially for the beautiful babies to be able to see a reflection of themselves.”
item.author: PopBase
